com.example.starvedrock

Class FragmentAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v4.view.PagerAdapter
      • android.support.v4.app.FragmentStatePagerAdapter
        • com.example.starvedrock.FragmentAdapter

  • public class FragmentAdapter
extends FragmentStatePagerAdapter
    This class extends a fragmentStatePagerAdapter to allow scrolling. This adapter allows a user to switch from the map fragment to the notification fragment to the poifragment.
    Author:
    josh
